analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/30/0xc518086f77b45498fabdaa93bdbea24393c7fed6.sol:
	Contract SFCCToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/30/0xc518086f77b45498fabdaa93bdbea24393c7fed6.sol#192-193)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/30/0xc518086f77b45498fabdaa93bdbea24393c7fed6.sol#64-66) is not in mixedCase
